title: Age before beauty
creator_credit: Sarah Gibson, Susan Lambert and Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative
brief_description: Shows older women involved in a variety of activities including exercise classes and dances. Shows them undertaking “alternative” health treatments such as chiropractry and acupuncture. Exposes the negative stereotyping of older women and investigates women’s fear of the aging process.
